Subject: Chaos Machine
Description: This customizable marble roller coaster is a perennial favorite, serving as a metaphor for the open source development process. The Chaos Machine is available all weekend for Penguicon attendees to tinker with!  Speakers include:

Subject: Free Fates Fortune Telling Booth
Description: Find a token, bring it to the booth in the lobby, and randomly generated predictions will be given to you! You may also write a short question and receive a Yes or No answer in return. Hours of operation posted at the booth.  Speakers include:Valerie Hibbard

Subject: Giant Jenga
Description: Stop by and play some (enormous) Jenga with your friends, or meet new people. No writing dirty things on the blocks! You'll just have to use your imagination.  Speakers include:

Subject: NUET Scouts
Description: The Scouts are at it again! The Nearly Useless Entertainment Team is back for another year at Penguicon, bringing you fun, mayhem, and shenanigans. Find us wandering the con to see what we have planned this year.  Speakers include:Justin Coluzzi, Kevin McLeod, Alex Drummer

Subject: Pengicon Picture Bingo
Description: Snap a picture of each clue and you will be rewarded! Go to Registration, Ops, or the Greeter Table to get started!  Speakers include:

Subject: Pirate Sea Chanties!
Description: Rathbone the Pirate will enchant us with authentic sea chanties throughout the weekend!  Speakers include:Rathbone the Pirate

Subject: Ribbon Fairies
Description: Look out for the Ribbon Fairies! If you find them, you can trade them a ribbon for a ribbon!  Speakers include:

Subject: Where in the World?
Description: Wondering where people are coming from to go to Penguicon?  Stop by and tag the city you came from on the World, US or Michigan map!  Speakers include:

Subject: Pirate Treasure Hunt!
Description: Join our Mayhem Featured Guest Rathbone the Pirate on a treasure hunt throughout the hotel!  Speakers include:Rathbone the Pirate

Subject: 'Pieces of Eight' Live from Penguicon!
Description: This live recording of Rathbone the Pirate's 'Pieces of Eight' webcast will give attendees a chance to have their pirate questions answered. Special guest: Mitch 'Duckman' Peters  Speakers include:Rathbone the Pirate, Mitch 'Duckman' Peters
